Articles.Content:
Harvestr stated in the devnote Tuesday that kerbals will now (hopefully) be able to clamber up ledges that they can reach, allowing them to scale some spacecraft. That got me thinking, could you make...

Kerbal Parkour???!!!???

Harvestr stated in the devnote Tuesday that kerbals will now (hopefully) be able to clamber up ledges that they can reach, allowing them to scale some spacecraft. That got me thinking, could you make...

Kerbal Parkour???!!!???

I wouldn't place any bets on this, even if my life depended on placing bets in it.

The things HarvesteR say end up not lining with the things HarvesteR do.
Kerbal Kreed should be the correct spelling

Is it just me, or is kerbal parkour/acts of acrobatics already possible?

Picture a running kerbal (or at least, whatever kerbals do to move, cause that's not running, that's more like.. waddling, like a penguin), on a structural platform with a large jetpack apparatus on his back. He leaps off. It now reveals he's on Minmus (or the Mun).

Cue a dramatic shot of him leaping over a frozen river. He ignites his external jetpack. It launches him up. He ditches the external jetpack, and starts to use his EVA suit's instead. He performs a steady burn to start slowing down after floating for a while.

He ends by landing on a platform at the other end of the river, unscathed, and ready for the next launch. He has a maniacal smile on his face. He is the BadS. He is the Jeb.

+rep to someone who does this and makes a video of it, cause that'd be freaking AWESOME.
Spin-off game ideas: Prince of Kerbin, Kerbin Raider, Kerbal's Edge, Katman: Kerbal Asylum

Spin-off game ideas: Prince of Kerbin, Kerbin Raider, Kerbal's Edge, Katman: Kerbal Asylum

We already have a kerbal asylum it's called Danny2462

I'm kinda hoping it finally lets me climb to the helipads on top of the VAB. That got even more glitched in 0.90 and now poor Jeb can't even reach the roof.

Just make a Kerbal cannon. Aim for the roof pads.

Just make a Kerbal cannon. Aim for the roof pads.

Or get them up there in a parachute capsule, or an actual helicopter.

We already have a kerbal asylum it's called Danny2462

Here you go, have some rep!
